directions: Toss tomatoes, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, cucumber, radishes, olive oil, scallion, lemon juice, sumac, and salt together in a bowl; let stand for flavors to blend, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: 1 red bell pepper, cut into 1/4-inch cubes
1 green bell pepper, cut into 1/4-inch cubes
1 teaspoon lemon juice, or to taste
title: Fresh Israeli Salad
